t: Amazon.com: 3Doodler 2.0 + 2 plastic packs + US plug : Industrial & Scientific
s: The 3Doodler 2.0 is the world's first 3D printing pen, made even better! As 3Doodler draws, it extrudes heated plastic which quickly cools and solidifies into a strong, stable structure. This allows you to build an infinite variety of shapes and items with ease!

t: Amazon.com: 3Doodler 3D Printing Pen with 50 Strands of Plastic, Black : Industrial & Scientific
s: My husband got this as a replacement to a wanna-be 3Doodler (cheapo off-brand 3D printing pen) and he loved it so much more than his other pen. It was a lot easier to use overall. his only complaint was that it was so fat - it made it hard to get certain angles and to do certain things....
